summary: A couple take a vacation to a remote island - their last holiday together before they become parents. Soon after their arrival, they notice that no adults seem to be present - an observation that quickly presents a nightmarish reality.
cast: Vinessa Shaw|Ebon Moss-Bachrach|Daniel Giménez Cacho|Gerardo Taracena|Alejandro Alvarez|Sarah Lindberg

title: Juego de niños
